Package com.example.segfaultsquadapplication.impl.following

Class Following

java.lang.Object
com.example.segfaultsquadapplication.impl.following.Following
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDbData
public class Following extends Object implements IDbData
This file is to save the following relationship between users stored in firebase Uses getters and setters for follow details querying
